mapper.select: select * from calendar where EMP_NO=#{empNo} and SCHEDULE_THEME_NO=1
select * from calendar where SCHEDULE_NO=#{scheduleNo} and SCHEDULE_THEME_NO=1
select MAX(SCHEDULE_NO) from calendar where EMP_NO=#{empNo}
select * from calendar where SCHEDULE_FOLDER_NO=#{scheduleFolderNo} and SCHEDULE_THEME_NO=1
mapper.delete: delete from calendar where SCHEDULE_FOLDER_NO=#{scheduleFolderNo} and SCHEDULE_THEME_NO=1
mapper.update: update calendar set SCHEDULE_COLOR=#{scheduleColor} where SCHEDULE_FOLDER_NO=#{scheduleFolderNo} and SCHEDULE_THEME_NO=1
mapper.select: select * from calendar where BOOKING_TARGET_NO=#{bookingTargetNo} and SCHEDULE_THEME_NO=2

select count(*) from calendar where EMP_NO=#{empNo} and #{nowDate} >= TRUNC(TO_DATE(SCHEDULE_START,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) and #{nowDate} < TRUNC(TO_DATE(SCHEDULE_END,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')+1) and TRUNC(#{nowDate}) != TRUNC(TO_DATE(SCHEDULE_END,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))

select count(*) from calendar where SCHEDULE_THEME_NO=2 AND BOOKING_TARGET_NO=#{bookingTargetNo} AND (TO_DATE(#{scheduleStart},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') >= TO_DATE(SCHEDULE_START,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{scheduleStart},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') < TO_DATE(SCHEDULE_END,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) OR (TO_DATE(#{scheduleEnd},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') > TO_DATE(SCHEDULE_START,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{scheduleEnd},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') <= TO_DATE(SCHEDULE_END,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')) OR (TO_DATE(#{scheduleStart},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') <= TO_DATE(SCHEDULE_START,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{scheduleEnd},'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') >= TO_DATE(SCHEDULE_END,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'))
